welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hanover Park, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you feel at home here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves American Airlines and its Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is also known as the O'Hare International Terminal.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including dining options, duty-free shopping, and currency exchange services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport, providing efficient and secure transportation of goods.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities such as shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for all passengers and can be accessed throughout the airport.
